title: Advanced Data Structures
description: This course delves into complex data structures, including heaps, trees, and graphs. Emphasis is on their implementation and optimization. Real-world applications are explored through hands-on projects.

title: Advanced Data Structures
description: This course delves into complex data structures, including heaps, trees, and graphs. Emphasis is on their implementation and optimization. Real-world applications are explored through hands-on projects.

title: Introduction to Cloud Computing
description: Learn the basics of cloud computing, including IaaS, PaaS, and SaaS. The course introduces major cloud providers like AWS and Azure. Students will build scalable applications using cloud technologies.

title: Introduction to Cloud Computing
description: Learn the basics of cloud computing, including IaaS, PaaS, and SaaS. The course introduces major cloud providers like AWS and Azure. Students will build scalable applications using cloud technologies.

title: Human-Computer Interaction
description: Explore the principles of HCI, focusing on user-centered design and usability. Topics include accessibility and interaction models. Students will design interfaces using state-of-the-art tools.

title: Human-Computer Interaction
description: Explore the principles of HCI, focusing on user-centered design and usability. Topics include accessibility and interaction models. Students will design interfaces using state-of-the-art tools.

title: Parallel and Distributed Systems
description: Learn the foundations of parallel and distributed computing. Topics include message-passing, multithreading, and system synchronization. Students will work on projects using distributed algorithms.

title: Parallel and Distributed Systems
description: Learn the foundations of parallel and distributed computing. Topics include message-passing, multithreading, and system synchronization. Students will work on projects using distributed algorithms.

title: Game Development Basics
description: An introduction to game development, covering game design, mechanics, and physics. Students will create simple games using popular frameworks. Emphasis is on creativity and interactive storytelling.

title: Game Development Basics

title: Advanced Cybersecurity
description: Delve deeper into cybersecurity concepts, including penetration testing and ethical hacking. Topics include advanced cryptography and malware analysis. Students will work on real-world security challenges.

title: Advanced Cybersecurity
description: Delve deeper into cybersecurity concepts, including penetration testing and ethical hacking. Topics include advanced cryptography and malware analysis. Students will work on real-world security challenges.

title: Natural Language Processing
description: An introduction to NLP techniques, including text processing and language models. Topics cover sentiment analysis, machine translation, and chatbot development. Students will implement NLP algorithms in Python.

title: Natural Language Processing
description: An introduction to NLP techniques, including text processing and language models. Topics cover sentiment analysis, machine translation, and chatbot development. Students will implement NLP algorithms in Python.

title: IoT Systems and Applications
description: Explore the principles of IoT, including sensors, actuators, and edge computing. Students will design IoT solutions for smart homes and cities. The course emphasizes hardware integration and real-world applications.
